name: Vax Quest
description:
Description

Play as a cute vaccine named Pills delving deep into the human body on a quest to destroy Coronus in this bullet hell shooter.

Controls

Movement with the Arrow Keys or WASD. Shoot with Z. Confirm with Enter.

Credits

  • Artwork (Pills, Coronus, Enemies, Splash Art, Tilesets): Shayla, https://twitter.com/SashimiSplash
  • Music: Presence Of Music, http://www.presence-of-music.com/
  • Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen, https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
  • Sound Effects: sfxr, http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
